series_description: This series documents the provision of for hire intrastate operating authority and issuance of certificates of broker licenses to motor carriers transporting passengers or property. This series may include, but is not limited to: completed applications, certificates of compliance, criminal background checks, public notices, and correspondence.

series_title: Case Management Files: Company Financial Information
series_description: This series documents the financial information of motor that are granted for hire intrastate operating authority. This series may include, but is not limited to: surety bonds, irrevocable letters of credit, and tariffs.

This series documents the review and issuance of permits to haul over-dimensional loads and configurations on the highways. This series may include, but is not limited to: applications, research, approvals or denials, bridge reviews, sketches, variance letters, and supporting documentation. 46.2-1139 et. seq.
retention_statement: 3 Years after end of calendar year

series_description: This series documents the International Fuels Tax Agreement (IFTA) licensing of Virginia-based motor carriers, as well as proof of the motor carriers' quarterly IFTA tax report filing. This series may include, but is not limited to: applications, quarterly tax reports, and correspondence.
